organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Thursday 200 Week Ago Holiday Year Ago 10,900

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Thursday |
| Year Ago |
| Holiday |

These are the only valid organizations mentioned in the paragraph. "Thursday" can be considered an organization of days in a week, "Year Ago" is a term used to refer to a specific organization of time, and "Holiday" is a type of organization that celebrates or commemorates an event or occasion.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Holiday |

The only valid organization mentioned in the paragraph is "Holiday". "Thursday" and "Year Ago" are not organizations, but rather a day of the week and a temporal expression, respectively.
